entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Shelburne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.7°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon then light late in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
